description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Twin-towning and international co-operation with neighbouring countries; the lowering of frontier barriers; small circuses - showing a typical family circus; the 150th anniversary of the Berlin Museum and the exhibition of the human countenance down the ages; plastics, their production from coal rather than oil; Horse racing and trotting on the North Sea mud-flats.
